author: Toby Cecchini
description: Fruity and sweet 'n' sour with gin-laced stone fruit and lime. If you have a dry/sour palate, and depending on your apricot liqueur and limes, then cut the sugar syrup back to 7.5ml (¼oz) if using 2:1 sugar syrup. (If using 1:1 "simple syrup" then 10ml will produce a dry cocktail.)
name: Improved Pendennis Club Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
